name: John Smith
chef_description: John Smith is a talented chef with 10 years of experience in the culinary industry. His passion for Italian cuisine shines through in his creations. With an extensive repertoire of 50 recipes, he has gained a strong following and received 100 likes for his delectable dishes. You can learn more about Chef John Smith and explore his culinary journey on his website.

recipes.cooking_method: 1. Marinate the chicken with soy sauce, cooking wine, and cornstarch. 2. Stir-fry the chicken with peanuts, chili peppers, ginger, and garlic. 3. Add a sauce made of soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, and cornstarch. 4. Serve with rice.
1. Cook the ground pork with chili bean paste and doubanjiang. 2. Add tofu, fermented black beans, and green onions. 3. Season with soy sauce and Sichuan peppercorns. 4. Serve with rice.

recipes.recipe_name: Steamed Fish with Ginger and Scallions
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Clean and season the fish with soy sauce, sesame oil, and rice wine. 2. Top the fish with ginger and scallions. 3. Steam for 8-10 minutes. 4. Serve with hot oil and soy sauce.
